item.title: [Z508] What's wrong with this starter code?!? [Z508]
item.description:
@11167 wrote:

[quote=“xx qwertyuiop xx, post:4, topic:287071”][quote]
if(cmd[0].equals(“starter”) && p.starter = 0) {
[/quote]
you’re using an assignment operator instead of a comparative operator.[/quote]

His statement has nothing to do with Java… Break it down to its simplest form: assignment and comparative.

Read full topic

item.title: [Z508] What's wrong with this starter code?!? [Z508]
item.dc:creator: @system system
item.description:
@system wrote:

this is my starter code

if(cmd[0].equals("starter") && p.starter = 0) { p.starter = 1; Engine.playerItems.addItem(p, 995, 10000000); return; }

and when i compile i get this error

Compiling net/com/codeusa/Engine.java .\net\com\codeusa\net\packethandler\Commands.java:92: operator && cannot be appl ied to boolean,int if(cmd[0].equals("starter") && p.starter = 0) { ^ 1 error Press any key to continue . . .

Im using Z508 source and I can’t figure out what the hell is wrong here.

Read full topic
